title: Enjoy great memories this Eid at Tilal Liwa HotelTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Enjoy great memories this Eid at Tilal Liwa Hotel Published on : Sunday, July 12, 2015
In celebration of the end of Ramadan, Tilal Liwa Hotel, a secluded hideaway leisure resort perched on the edge of Rub Al Khalil Desert in Abu Dhabi’s Empty Quarter, offers an amazing package that guarantees a truly festive setting for families and friends during Eid Al Fitr.
The 111-room property presents an exceptional deal worth AED699/- during the celebration of Eid Al Fitr which includes an overnight stay at Tilal Room with desert view, buffet breakfast and dinner, 10-minute camel riding,complimentary use of extensive recreational facilities and complimentary room upgrade to next room category (subject to availability).Surrounded by the vast desert, Tilal Liwa Hotel provides the perfect setting for guests to share a delicious lunch or dinner together at Al Badiya Restaurant, serving up a mix of Arabic, Mediterranean and international cuisine.
Children will also be taken care of with special treats prepared just for them. There are lots of activities that families and friends can do during their stay such as quad biking, kite flying, giant chess and many more.The Eid Al Fitr offer is valid from 17th to 19th July. The room packages are available for two adults and two children under age of 12. Rates are subject to 10% service charge and tourism fee. Children below 6 years enjoy free meals and six years up to 12 years get 50% discount.
Source:-Tilal Liwa Hotel
